name: RussianPunk 2007
description:
The worker from the factory thought like everyone else that 2007 will not be returned!Until he accidentally stumbled upon magic mushrooms on his way home.

Nostalgic-ironic first-person shooter. Embark on a fascinating journey - Russia 2007 year. You are expected to meet with popular subcultures. A huge arsenal of unique weapons. Emo, Goths, Punks and other "EVIL SPIRITS" are waiting for their fate.

Features:

  • Cherry "Blazer"
  • Dollar for 30 rubles
  • Boss battles
  • Dynamic gameplay
